20101217025156.714|20101217025158.143|CCO|           Great news!
20101217025158.143|20101217025159.571|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101217025159.571|20101217025201.000|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101217025201.000|20101217025202.250|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101217025202.250|20101217025203.500|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101217025203.500|20101217025204.750|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101217025204.750|20101217025206.000|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101217025206.000|20101217025207.250|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101217025207.250|20101217025208.500|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101217025208.500|20101217025209.750|CCO|       because it contains
20101217025209.750|20101217025211.000|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101217025211.000|20101217025212.250|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101217025212.250|20101217025213.500|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101217025213.500|20101217025214.750|CCO|        working together
20101217025214.750|20101217025216.000|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101217025216.000|20101217025217.250|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101217025217.250|20101217025218.500|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101217025218.500|20101217025219.750|CCO|        and should not be
20101217025219.750|20101217025221.000|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101217025221.000|20101217025222.250|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101217025222.250|20101217025223.500|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101217025223.500|20101217025224.750|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101217025224.750|20101217025226.000|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101217025226.000|20101217025227.250|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101217025227.250|20101217025228.500|CCO|     and some eye problems.
